short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Navigate the world wide web with the power of your keyboard

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Browse the world wide web with the power of your keyboard.

keyn adds a keyboard driven link picker that enables you to move around the internet without reaching for your mouse. Just hit Ctrl+Comma, filter by typing part of the link text, select your 

1. Activate with Ctrl+Comma
2. Optionally: filter by typing part of the link text, or the number next to the link
3. Hit Enter and go!
